ygData.subject: Re: Blackened Iron Armor *SPOILER* (sort of)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... you ... Paw...I ... Shoot, at Lvl 15 all you really need is one good partner to take High Shaman Lenrel and his buddies.  I teamed up with a Lvl 16 druid
ygData.messageBody:
>From: "john doe" <ruldaas@...>
>
>If you are in the mid-teens I would recommend going to Infected Paw. It is
>generally empty and you can kill gnolls until you are so overloaded with
>loot you can't even move. If you get a decent sized group of level 15's
you
>should be able to take Nobles and maybe even a commander or named shamen.
>Nobles drop snakeskin armor, and named shamen drop runed totem staffs from
>time to time. From levels 16-19(current level) I made many trips to
Paw...I
>have over 170pp in the bank now...and a combine scim...pugius dagger...
>
>Ruldaas
>The Rathe
>
>


Shoot, at Lvl 15 all you really need is one good partner to take High
Shaman Lenrel and his buddies. I teamed up with a Lvl 16 druid down
there, and had a great time.
